bio: Raven Rock's volcanic expanse shaped the destiny of Pavati O'Riordan, a Lungaris mage necromancer, on a quest to master the forbidden art of necromancy. Skilled in conjuration and destruction magic, her journey unfolded amidst the flickering flames. Confronting her fear of the undead, she ventured into the catacombs, forging a connection with the spectral forces that lingered within the shadows.
name: Pavati O'Riordan
